articles.description: Tampa Bay Buccaneers report multiple cases of coronavirus at its Tampa, Florida, training center, where the team said it would continue operations.
articles.content:
Multiple people at the Tampa Bay Buccaneers' training center in Tampa, Florida, have tested positive for the coronavirus, the NFL team said Saturday.

articles.title: MLB teams will now train at their home ballparks due to coronavirus concerns - Detroit Free Press
articles.description: With spring training sites in Florida and Arizona experiencing COVID-19 outbreaks, MLB teams will now shift their training to home ballparks.
articles.content:
What I'm Hearing: MLB insider Bob Nightengale tells us that owners and the league are not happy with super agent Scott Boras as they believe he's intentionally slowing down negotiations to restart.
